Package logic

Class PhoneAction

java.lang.Object
logic.PhoneAction
public class PhoneAction extends Object
Provides static utility methods for actions related to Users and Persons, such as searching, adding, editing, and deleting, by interfacing with the DatabaseManager.
Author:
Leuti Michele

    • searchUser

      public static User searchUser(String userName)
      Searches for a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      The User object if found; otherwise, returns null.

      public static void checkUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check for existence.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the username already exists in the database.

    • searchPerson

      public static Person searchPerson(User u, String id)
      Searches for a person by their ID and associated user.
      Parameters:
      u - The User object associated with the person.
      id - The ID of the person to search for.
      Returns:
      The Person object if found; otherwise, returns null.

    • Search

      public static ArrayList<Person> Search(User u, String str)
      Searches for persons matching a specified search string under a specific user.
      Parameters:
      u - The User object associated with the persons.
      str - The search string to match against person names and other attributes.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Person objects matching the search criteria.
